text: @NYGovCuomo Take responsibility for your own actions jackass.  25% of #covid19 deaths in the US occurred in NY.  And stop blaming nursing home staff for all the nursing home deaths.  You did that with you executive order forcing nursing homes to take Covid positive patients.
